Introduce a special unit nationally to tackle public disorder. Using officers who are of a high fitness level and who will specialise in public disorder this way when disorder happens they can be called on to help forces around the country and place them at the front of disorder whilst there is no disorder this unit could help with surveillance , raids and sporting events.

And if a force wants to carry out a large project to tackle major crime or street crime etc, these officers again could be used to increase that forces numbers for that project. This would ensure public order officers of the highest standard and fitness.
